history.proof: intros x m M H. unfold Rabs, Rmax. destruct H. hauto use: Rmult_1_r, Rnot_le_lt, Rle_lt_trans, Ropp_le_contravar unfold: Rmin, Rle, Rmax inv: sumbool.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros x m M H. unfold Rabs, Rmax. destruct H. destruct (Rle_dec M (- m)). - apply RRle_abs. - apply Rabs_le_between; split. + unfold Rmin. apply Rmin_l. + apply Rmin_r.
